      • AbiControl

        public AbiControl(java.lang.String mac)

    • Method Detail

      • getAbiConnectedForArm

        public static java.lang.String getAbiConnectedForArm()
        Get the mac address of arm blood pressure meter, if you only want to measure arm blood pressure.
        Returns:
        the mac address of arm blood pressure meter, return null if no device connected.

      • getAbiConnected

        public static java.lang.String getAbiConnected()
        Get the mac address of leg blood pressure meter, if you want to measure arm and len blood pressure at the same time (ABI).
        Returns:
        the mac address of leg blood pressure meter, return null if no device connected.

      • getBattery

        public boolean getBattery()
        Get battery for arm blood pressure meter, if only arm blood pressure meteor is connected; Get battery for arm and leg blood pressure if both arm and leg blood pressure are connected.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the battery status, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is AbiProfile.ACTION_BATTERY_ABI.
        • Thr Keys of message will show in the KeyList of AbiProfile.ACTION_BATTERY_ABI.
        Returns:
        true if one arm blood pressure meter and a leg blood pressure meter are connected at least

      • startMeasure

        public boolean startMeasure()
        Start to measure blood pressure for arm blood pressure meter, if only arm blood pressure meteor is connected; Start to measure blood pressure for arm and leg blood pressure if both arm and leg blood pressure are connected.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the battery status, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The actions of the callback are:
          1. AbiProfile.ACTION_ZEROING_ABI
          2. AbiProfile.ACTION_ZERO_OVER_ABI
          3. AbiProfile.ACTION_ONLINE_PRESSURE_ABI
          4. AbiProfile.ACTION_ONLINE_PULSE_WAVE_ABI
          5. AbiProfile.ACTION_ONLINE_RESULT_ABI
          6. AbiProfile.ACTION_ERROR_ABI
          7. AbiProfile.ACTION_INTERRUPTED_ABI
        Returns:
        true if one arm blood pressure meter and a leg blood pressure meter are connected at least

      • stopMeasure

        public boolean stopMeasure()
        Stop measure for blood pressure meter.
        • Attention, call iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback) firstly.
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will not return immediately. After get the battery status, Callback iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String, String, String, String) will be triggered.
        • The action of the callback is AbiProfile.ACTION_STOP_ABI.
        Returns:
        true if one arm blood pressure meter and a leg blood pressure meter are connected at least

      • disconnect

        public boolean disconnect()
        Disconnect the connected blood pressure meter currently. After disconnect, CallbackiHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceConnectionStateChange(String, String, int, int, Map) will be triggered.
        Returns:
        true if one arm blood pressure meter and a leg blood pressure meter are connected at least
